css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-74e2c0e1-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);max-width:1170px;min-width:initial;flex-wrap:wrap;row-gap:20px;-moz-column-gap:2.5%;column-gap:2.5%;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-74e2c0e1-u{max-width:1690px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-74e2c0e1-u{max-width:90%;}}
